Description: You come across an injured smuggler who is bleeding out on the ground. He whimpers as you approach, desperately clutching his sword but clearly too weak to raise it. He gurgles "h-help...".

    "ReplyText": "Do your best to heal the dying smuggler and mention you met his friends.",
    "SSRewardText": "You do your best to heal the wounded smuggler and point him towards the cave opening you just came through. You mention to him the smugglers camp you came across and show him the compass you were given, telling him that if he uses it and goes southwest from the cave that he will find his friends at the lake. He thanks you and quickly hands you some small trinkets and keepsakes he had been wearing. As he shuffles away towards the light, he acknowledges his gifts aren't much but he hopes you will find them useful. The objects radiate feelings of gratitude from admist their cracked casings - you're not sure what magic lies within the sentimental artifacts but you decide to keep them.",
